```{r}
#| label: ggplot-code
#| eval: false
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mpg) +
  aes(displ, hwy, colour = class) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = NULL, y = NULL) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.margin = margin(t = 0, r = 0, b = 0, l = 0, unit = "pt"),
    plot.title = element_text(size = 18),
    axis.text = element_text(size = 12),
    legend.position = "none"
  )
```
